definition: to go to the kitchen (to prepare a meal)/to cook
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: He charmed Olivia and Abby by making pancakes on Sunday mornings.
sentences.chinese: 他還在星期天早晨下廚做煎餅來討好奧麗維婭和艾碧。

sentences.english: Can I have a look at the kitchen?
The perfect compromise: easy, no-cook meals that are both healthy and slimming.
sentences.chinese: 一個很好的辦法就是簡單而又不用下廚的健康減肥餐。

sentences.english: Beam core cook for a while, for the first time was jinhua to smash.
sentences.chinese: 梁芯首次替一然下廚，卻被金華撞破。

sentences.english: That would be true if less cooking meant less eating.
sentences.chinese: 要是少下廚意味着少喫，那倒是對的。

sentences.english: Sometimes husbands also cook at weekends.
sentences.chinese: 丈夫在週末有時也會下廚。

sentences.english: She was unlucky enough to draw kitchen cleanup twice in one week.
sentences.chinese: 她夠倒黴的，在一週內兩次抽籤得下廚打掃。

sentences.english: Afterwards, I'll cook us curry. Do you like it?
sentences.chinese: 閱讀後我將親自下廚做咖喱食物，你喜歡嗎？

sentences.english: She is very busy at home. She has to take care of the children and do the kitchen work.
sentences.chinese: 她在家很忙，又要看好孩子，又要下廚房。

sentences.english: Can Mum still be allowed in the kitchen?
My mother was ill . I had to turn cook.
sentences.chinese: 我母親病了，我只好親自下廚。

sentences.english: Mother wants me to help her in the kitchen. I'll say goodbye.
sentences.chinese: 媽媽要我下廚房幫忙，就此擱筆。

sentences.english: Alternatively, you could try cooking a candlelit dinner.
sentences.chinese: 此外還有另一個選擇，就是你下廚爲對方做燭光晚餐。

sentences.english: Our daughters are gonna cook for us on our tenth anniversary.
sentences.chinese: 女兒們在十週年紀念日那天爲我們下廚。

sentences.english: As it is planned, star friends coming to the restaurant will be asked to cook in person and show others his private dishes.
sentences.chinese: 按照計劃，明星朋友來了讓他們親自下廚展示私家菜。

sentences.english: I have always found culinary experiments interesting.
sentences.chinese: 在我看來，下廚房總是趣味盎然。

definition: to praise without cease (idiom); praise sb to high heaven
to take care of/to raise money/to attend to (guests, customers etc)
master/qualified worker/respectful form of address for older men/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]
